Author: cipi#4502
Content: @Nabob sent that to me and i had a look... bobdeposit and alicepayment were done, both are unspent though... next would have been bob doing bobpayment, but that one is missing... if you call swapstatus for that swap it should be "rewinded" (alice gets back alicepayment and bob bobdeposit)

Author: cipi#4502
Content: yes, like this `curl --url "http://127.0.0.1:7783" --data "{\"userpass\":\"$userpass\",\"method\":\"swapstatus\",\"requestid\":3076945675,\"quoteid\":1167555031}"`

Author: artem.pikulin#0794
Content: @lukechilds @strugglebus Hi, in case of stuck swaps it's required to provide MM logs and swap data from `DB/SWAPS` directory. In this particular case I need to know bob deposit tx id to retrieve Bob PrivN (in case bob refunded the deposit). Please provide this info in PM and I'll be able to help.

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: i think strugglebus just needs to do a swapstatus

Author: lukechilds#2707
Content: Opening HyperDEX will do that automatically

Author: lukechilds#2707
Content:
But if SWAPS data is still needed then you can get that by clicking `Debug > Show App Data` in HyperDEX
Then inside the directory that pops up navigate to: `marketmaker/DB/SWAPS`

Author: artem.pikulin#0794
Content: @strugglebus Please follow steps Luke posted above, if HyperDEX restart doesn't help please send the swap data to me in PM.

Content: @yo88 hyperdex is another trading software built on same barterdex network, same API calls, different gui and features.  barterdex is the "reference" of anything that is possible on the dex network.   hyperdex is a polished version of the functions for trading.
